name: PowerOrb Neon
description:
What is PowerOrb Neon?

PowerOrb Neon is a futuristic, 3D synthwave ball game set in a dark, neon-lit world. It's a fast-paced and adrenaline-fuelled mini game that can be played over and over again. 

It's in early access, is it playable?

Yes. The game is being expanded into a full-featured and multi-dimensional entertainment experience. However, it its current form it is simple, pure and fully playable. You play the game in a single space with one simple goal: keep the ball in play as long as possible to get the highest score you can.

Is it being developed further?

Absolutely. Our roadmap for the game includes a huge list of upgrades to the game including multiple game modes, multiplayer support, unlockable levels, paddles and orbs amongst a multitude of other features.

Why buy now if it's going to get better?

By buying the game now, you will be getting immediate access to a fun game that will expand further over time. All future updates will be free to early-access players, even if the price increases. On top of that, you will be supporting an indie developer who's main focus is on creating quality gaming experiences for players.

How was the game made?

PowerOrb Neon was built using original assets modelled in Blender and the game itself was built inside of Unreal Engine.

I love the music. Where did it come from?

The fantastic original music and sound design was composed and created specifically for this game by Derek Brown. Find him on Twitter: @subwoofersub
